str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
From anthropos and aresko; man-courting, i.e. Fawning.
From ophthalmos and douleia; sight-labor, i.e. That needs watching.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
